'''Nasha Town''' is a location within [[Nod-Krai]] in [[Snezhnaya]]. It was first mentioned in the [[On the Trail of Behemoths]] event. Both the "Speranza" and the [[Voynich Guild]] operate in this area, and [[Katya]] lives here.<ref>YouTube: [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=NbDXwuUWxhY&ab_channel=GenshinImpact Behind the Scenes of Genshin Impact "Let's Start With Nod-Krai" | Genshin Impact #NodKrai]</ref><ref>{{Ref/NPC|Helka}}</ref>
